title: Spicy avocado and chicken wraps
ingredients: ['1 cooked chicken breast, sliced at an angle', 'a generous sqeeze of fresh lemon juice', '2 to 3 teaspoons peri-peri seasoning', '1 avocado, stone removed', '1 large tortilla wrap', 'a generous bunch of fresh coriander, chopped', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1/2 or 1 whole red chilli (to taste), finely chopped', '1 large handful spinach']
